{InvalidPath}: Invalid path.  Do not fail me again.
{InvalidSaveFolder}: This is not the X3 save folder.  The save folder ends with 'save'.
{Tips.BtnGenerateSystems}: Takes all the settings below and Generates a new Map, new Gates, and fills in each system with a new set of Attributes
{Tips.BtnGenerateGates}: Allows you to re-generate the gate network as many times as you like.
{Tips.BtnGenerateStats}: Allows you to re-generate the system attributes as many times as you like.
{Tips.BtnX3Root}: Click to Set the root folder of your Mayhem 3 installation.
{Tips.BtnX3Save}: Click to set the location where your X3 saved game files are stored.
{Tips.CbClusteredVoids}: Attempts to Group the empty (void) areas together rather than sprinkle empty systems randomly.
{Tips.CbClusteredXenon}: Attempts to Group Xenon sectors together rather than sprinkle empty systems randomly.
{Tips.CbShattered}: Changes empty (void) map percentage from 15% to 35% resulting in far less systems for the same map dimensions.
{Tips.CbLimitedEnclaves}: When NOT checked, the gate generator will attempt to remove 'some' gates where doing so will result in a system having only 1 gate in or out.
{Tips.CbExtraSystemStats}: Adds extra Population, Research, and Support to every system.
{Tips.SlFog}: Sets average fog level across the galaxy.
{Tips.GbExpansion}: Determines ratio of unknown sectors to populated sectors for a map. Higher expansion results in far less unknown sectors at game start.
{Tips.GbSystemSpread}: Provides a race specific offset (weight) that will lower or raise the starting number of systems of that race in comparison to other races.
{Tips.GbGalaxySize}: Determines the approximate dimensions of a system.
{Tips.GbGateDensity}: Determines the level of gates created near a race's borders.  Low density results in less gates connecting differing races.
{Tips.GbMusic}:
Determines list used for System music
Basic = \mayhem_data\custom_musics.txt
Litcube = \mayhem_data\custom_musics_lu.txt
All = Every music file found in your \soundtrack folder
{Tips.GbRelations}: Allows you to set permanent friend/foe status between races at game start
{Tips.cbChaotic}: Xenon's own half of the map.  Their Maelstrom sector is in the corner.
{Tips.cbPeaceful}: Only a single Xenon sector is created.  This is also the Maelstrom sector.
lblLoadsSelected: Loads selected Map into the Generator
lblDeletesSelected: Deletes selected Map folder and files.
{UpdateActiveMapWarning}:
You are updating your Active Map!
Your saved games may no longer be compatible with it. Do you wish to proceed?
{DelMapWarning}: This will delete the map and all backed up saved games for this map.  Are you sure you want to delete
{ProdConsumNotSame}: Production and Consumption can not be the same value.
